Class Room

java.lang.Object
Room
public class Room extends Object
Describes a college classroom.

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room()

    • Room

      public Room(int seatingCap, String buildingName, int roomNum) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Non-default constructor
      Parameters:
      seatingCap - the maximum number of people a given classroom can sit
      buildingName - the name of the building where the class takes place
      roomNum - the number of the room
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - thrown if newSeatingCap is less than 0

  • Method Details

    • getSeatingCap

      public int getSeatingCap()
      Returns the current seating cap.

    • setSeatingCap

      public void setSeatingCap(int newSeatingCap) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the seating cap. Throws an exception if the value to set is less than 0.
      Parameters:
      newSeatingCap - the new maximum number of people a given classroom can sit
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - thrown if newSeatingCap is less than 0

      Parameters:
      newBuildingName - the new building name
